name: In The Portals | Demo version
description:
Hi everyone,

"In The Portals" is a action game that I am working on. The main attraction of the game is the portal by which you can teleport to the other end portal making fast movements. Every player has  a orb which they can throw to mark the far end of the portal. The game is in the early stages of development and thus may contain bugs. This is just a demo version released after completing some of the basic mechanics.

Controls -

-> WASD to move.

-> Space to jump and Left shift to sprint.

-> Q and E to peek left and right respectively.

-> Left mouse click for slow motion.

-> Sprint + W + (A [for left] OR D [for right]) + Space for Wall run. After the wall run begins hold W and Sprint for continuing the wall run.

-> While running press the opposite key of the side the wall you are running on and then Space to jump from the wall to the opposite side.

->  T to throw the far end portal orb. (The orb will only function if it falls on the red glowing platform.)

-> The press Left Control while looking toward the ground to open the near end portal (and thus simultaneously the far end portal).
